comments.author: AB de Royse777
comments.body: Nice Ann design.Welcome to the forum.Anyway to add bitcoin as your payment processor? Most of the users are comfortable using bitcoin here although many don't mind using altcoin. Just have it mind that featuring bitcoin on the site will bring 10x traffic and engagement on the site.Anyway, it's time for doing some marketing too. I am sure you planned for it already. However if you need someone to assist you in it then I can help on bitcointalk promotions. With a good strategy this forum could be a good asset for your business. There are many projects who started from this forum are now one of the leading in their industry.Good luck and welcome again.

comments.author: Little Mouse
comments.body: Wow! Very much impressed with the design.Great announcement too. You have launched with full preparation. Great.May I know if you have any deposit bonus for bitcointalk users? I would gladly give it a try.Do you have any plan to have marketing campaign here. Signature campaign is so much popular to reach bitcointalk gambling community. You can consider running one. Feel free to PM me if you are interested. I'm a campaign manager here for the last few years. You can PM me here or my telegram.

comments.author: klidex
comments.body: Welcome to the bitcointalk OP forum.The gambling platform that you are promoting seems quite interesting and I just tried to log in to take a look and it turns out that it also has features that look really good.The promotional board that you use also doesn't disappoint so that it can make gamblers curious and then intend to try playing there.When I entered earlier I also saw a deposit bonus of 100% up to $ 500 on the first page which might be of particular interest to gamblers. There is also an NFT market so that the platform you are promoting is not only for playing but betting on the NFTs that are already available there .

comments.author: blockman
comments.body: Hi there, welcome to bitcointalk.I just appreciate the color design of purple. It was only a few times that I'd seen a design like this before. And just like most of the casinos, you're only going to ask KYC if it's necessary. Wait a minute, is sherbet like an ice cream dessert, right?

comments.author: CryptSafe
comments.body: Welcome onboard bitcointalk platform. It is nice having you here. I see you already registered for a copper member account which grants you free upload of pictures which you have already done. This shows you are good at following laid down procedures, rules and regulations on platforms and it shows your good managerial skills in following policies. Looks like you are the sole representative of your casino here and I will also advise you to be very much active as members would be out to ask questions about your casino and possible reviews from members here would help you position your casino in the right direction not only that it would also give you good edge over others too and lastly, for a wider range of publicity, I would suggest you seek the expertise of a good signature campaign manager to help promote your presence here as that would aid in good marketing and advertising of your casino according to your budget.
